title: Azure Repos Quick FQR Guide
description: Customer-facing scoping questionnaire for Repos issues

requiredFields: What is the name of the organization or version of ADO Server?
Which team(s) are experiencing the issue?
Has this worked in the past?
Is this affecting a single or multiple repos?
Is the issue for a Git repo or a TFVC repo?
What is the name and URL of the affected repo?
Is this affecting all branches? What are the affected branches?
Are there any error messages you can share? Please provide a screenshot, and/or the full text of the error.
Please provide a detailed description of the issue (if not already provided in the ticket).

For Git Repos capture a verbose git trace:
  â€¢ Command example: `GIT_CURL_VERBOSE=1 git clone https://github.com/example/repo.git`
What are the permissions for the affected user at the project/repo/branch levels?
Does the issue reproduce when performing the operation using Git command line?
Are you currently behind a proxy or VPN?
For TFSVc systems confirm if there is an Azure DevOps Proxy Server in use.
